org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.csv.functions

Class StringEscaper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.csv.functions.StringEscaper

  • public class StringEscaper
extends Object
    Escapes characters in strings and allows to split escaped strings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringEscaper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static String escape(String string, Set<Character> escapedCharacters)
      Escapes the escapedCharacters in a string.

      Splits an escaped string while ignoring escaped delimiters.
      static String[] split(String escapedString, String delimiter, int limit)
      Splits an escaped string while ignoring escaped delimiters.
      static String unescape(String escapedString)
      Unescapes the escaped characters in a string.

    • Method Detail

      • escape

        public static String escape(String string,
                            Set<Character> escapedCharacters)
        Escapes the escapedCharacters in a string.
        Parameters:
        string - string to be escaped
        escapedCharacters - characters to be escaped
        Returns:
        escaped string

      • unescape

        public static String unescape(String escapedString)
        Unescapes the escaped characters in a string.
        Parameters:
        escapedString - string to be unescaped
        Returns:
        unescaped string

      • split

        public static String[] split(String escapedString,
                             String delimiter)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Splits an escaped string while ignoring escaped delimiters. Does not unescape the tokens.
        Parameters:
        escapedString - escaped string to be split
        delimiter - delimiter string
        Returns:
        string array with still escaped strings split by the delimiter
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the delimiter contains the escape character

      • split

        public static String[] split(String escapedString,
                             String delimiter,
                             int limit)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Splits an escaped string while ignoring escaped delimiters. Does not unescape the tokens.
        Parameters:
        escapedString - escaped string to be split
        delimiter - delimiter string
        limit - limits the size of the output
        Returns:
        string array with still escaped strings split by the delimiter
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the delimiter contains the escape character
